description:
After Teitos has been knocked out, Hakuren continues to fight Bastian.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The One Who Must be Forgiven Drown in Darkness... The One Who Loves Him is Filled With Tears
Yurusazaru Mono Yami ni Obore... Ai Suru Mono wa Namida ni Nureru
赦さざる者闇に溺れ... 愛する者は涙に濡れる
